text:
I know this is hard to believe, and it took me a while to grasp it myself,
but fail has been subtly broken, presumably for a while.

If you go <fail>message<fail>, you dont get "message", as the message, you
get "Nullmessage". This comes from the += in AddText appending to a null 
pointer. The interesting thing is that the JRE does not consider this
worthy of raising an NPE.
creator: steve_l@iseran.com

text: Shouldn't this be closed ? It looks like you fixed it in CVS.
creator: sbailliez@apache.org

text: It is fixed, though I think the fix could be tidied up.
creator: steve_l@iseran.com
